sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Maneuver) Once per round on the character's turn, the character may perform a Body Guard maneuver to protect one ally with whom he is engaged. He then suffers a number of strain no greater than his ranks in Body Guard. Until the start of the character's next turn, upgrade the difficulty of all combat checks targeting the protected ally a number of times equal to the strain suffered by the character.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Body guard</name> <number>TAL0001009</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 15:07:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>29d03d60db260c542901de90cf9619ed</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 15:07:18</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
